pullRequest.title: Add javadoc example and unit test for composing set via CodeWriter.on…
pullRequest.bodyText:
…Section() and inline section notation.
Issue #, if available: N/A
Based on slack discussion, added javadoc to demonstrate generating a list using inline sections with an accompanying unit test.  Happy to remove the unit test of deemed redundant.

commit.message: Add javadoc example and unit test for composing set via CodeWriter.onSection() and inline section notation.

nodes.bodyText: Oh, looks like this needs either a trailing newline, or you need to disable newlines in the writer

commit.message: Move test to smithy-utils and add trailing \n
